fields_of_interest: Energy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Climate Action
head_office_address: ZEP Communications v2w, Square de Meeus 38/10, 1000 Brussels
eu_initiatives: Policies to combat climate change and to reduce the emissions of CO2, specifically using Carbon Capture and Storage and Carbon Capture and Utilisation
goals__remit:
To represent the interests of numerous stakeholders on CCS.  
 
To advise on CCS as a key technology for combating climate change for all CO2 emitting industries, including energy intensive industry, hydrogen producers and producers of biofuels
relevant_communication: The activities undertaken include the development of publication and events that relate to issues of policy implementation. To ensure that this work is appropriately disseminated meetings are regularly held with officials to discuss the conclusions of this work.
